verses.roman:
śākhā-śreṣṭha dhruvānanda, śrīdhara brahmacārī
bhāgavatācārya, haridāsa brahmacārī

synonyms: śākhā-śreṣṭha—the chief branch; dhruvānanda—of the name Dhruvānanda; śrīdhara brahmacārī—of the name Śrīdhara Brahmacārī; bhāgavatācārya—of the name Bhāgavatācārya; haridāsa brahmacārī—of the name Haridāsa Brahmacārī.
translation: The chief branches of Śrī Gadādhara Paṇḍita were (1) Śrī Dhruvānanda, (2) Śrīdhara Brahmacārī, (3) Haridāsa Brahmacārī and (4) Raghunātha Bhāgavatācārya.

purport.content: Verse 152 of the Gaura-gaṇoddeśa-dīpikā describes Śrī Dhruvānanda Brahmacārī as an incarnation of Lalitā, and verse 194 describes Śrīdhara Brahmacārī as the gopī known as Candralatikā.
